original_title: An Hour and Some of Tony Law
overview: 'Yeah.... Yeah! .... YEAH!!....' and so starts our rollercoster ride of a DVD with Tony Law. And things just go up from there. Hear the truth about subjects others are too afraid to discuss like black bears, Belgians and the digeridoo. He was mentioned in our very first release as 'the most reasonable guy I know' by TV's Stewart Lee. See just how reasonable for yourself in a little over an hour.
title: An Hour and Some of Tony Law
